Author: cpolandc
Text: it’s a tv show about a guy living with cerebral palsy. it really tries to emphasize body acceptance, which is great, but also really triggering when they make jabs at thin girls. there was a even a scene where they decorated a birthday cake with a nutrition label!! calories and everything.

Author: WheelieMcScroterBall
Text: Haven’t heard of this yet. Is it about eds? Is it a documentary?
